recipesJson.name: Pink Eye
recipesJson.author: MrBurgundy
recipesJson.description:
Instead of pouring cinnamon powder on my cornflakes, I chopped up some sugar-coated strawberries and tossed them in the bowl.

Toasted Redux #1. I replaced Rich Cinnamon with a couple strawberries. I also bumped Cereal 27 from 3% to 5% so it will stand up to the strawberries enough. Really simple adaptation, yet it radically changes the profile. See Toasted for the cereal notes if you're interested.

Flavor Notes:

CAP Sweet Strawberry is a bright, sugary, candied flavor. It's exactly the kind of Strawberry you want in your cornflakes. At 4%, it‚Äôs present without totally overtaking everything.

TPA Strawberry Ripe brings a touch of that authentic, fresh strawberry flavor to the mix. 2% isn't very apparent, but it fleshes out the CAP Sweet Strawberry. There's not much else to say about it.

This is a good shake and vape. Let it sit for 1-3 days first and you will be rewarded.

Happy mixing. üëΩ

reviews.text: Awesome recipe full of flavor. Easy 5 üåü
Awesome juice, I think I‚Äôm going to bump up the sweetener but to me it somewhat resembles‚Äù the one‚Äù juice. Good job!!
This is pretty awesome, by day 3 tastes exactly as you would expect
I've mixed around 1000ml of this juice. I've given it to friends and everyone loves It. Definitely in my top 3. Thank you so much for this recipe.

Steeped mine for 13 days bypassed the dripper and put it straight into the hurricane tank as i liked the look of the profile.First to hit my taste buds are the strawberries then on the exhale the very slight taste of the cereal and toasted.The more i vape it the more together it becomes .. But i think i might enjoy it with the AP instead of the gcc more and a little dairy/milk maybe.
In the end still a good mix and im puffing through a tank right now well done.
